name: Ultimate Truco
description:
Ultimate Truco is a simulator of the famous classic of the deck called "Truco" or as it is called by the French "Truc". [/ b]

Become a LEGENDARY truco player in Ultimate Truco!
 - Challenge players from around the world.
 - Get experience and level up.
 - Participate in tournaments with prizes.
 - Collect Skins for your deck.

[RESOURCES]

- Matchs [General]
 The way of playing follows the "Brazilian" principles and rules of the mining region.

- Solo match [BOTS]
 The game consists of 'you' and a companion BOT versus 2 other companion BOTS. [Departure without merit].

- Casual Match [MULTIPLAYER]
 The game consists of 'you' and a teammate versus 2 other teammates. [Matches without XP].

- Competitive Match [MULTIPLAYER]
 The game consists of 'you' and a teammate versus 2 other teammates. [Starting with XP].

- Match with Friends [MULTIPLAYER]
 The match consists of 'you' and 3 other invited friends. [Departure without merit].
